footer.getLatestNews: Get the latest news and updates from NexusAI

home.heroSubtitle: Deploy AI workloads on the latest NVIDIA GPUs with enterprise-grade reliability and performance.

clusterEngine.heroSubtitle: Automated orchestration for AI workloads at scale. Deploy, manage, and monitor GPU clusters with enterprise-grade reliability and performance.
clusterEngine.integrationTitle: Your AI Control Plane for Cluster and Container Orchestration
clusterEngine.integrationSubtitle: Seamlessly integrate with your existing tools and infrastructure

scaling.title: Efficient Scaling
scaling.description: Automatically scale your GPU clusters up or down based on workload demands. Our intelligent orchestration ensures optimal resource utilization.

monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
monitoring.description: Monitor every aspect of your cluster with comprehensive dashboards. Track instance health, resource usage, and job progress in real-time.

analytics.title: Usage Analytics
analytics.description: Gain deep insights into your compute usage patterns. Visualize trends, optimize costs, and make data-driven infrastructure decisions.

resources.title: Resource Management
resources.description: Fine-grained control over every GPU, node, and container. Allocate resources precisely where they're needed with our intuitive management interface.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Bank-grade security for your AI workloads. Role-based access control, encryption at rest and in transit, and comprehensive audit logging.

clusterEngine.ctaTitle: Ready to scale your AI infrastructure?
clusterEngine.ctaSubtitle: Get started with Cluster Engine today and experience enterprise-grade orchestration.
clusterEngine.darkCtaSubtitle: Deploy, monitor, and scale your AI workloads with our intuitive Cluster Engine. Built for teams who demand reliability at scale.
clusterEngine.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Cluster Engine

careers.heroTitle: Build the Future of AI with NexusAI
careers.heroSubtitle: At NexusAI, we're not just building cutting-edge cloud infrastructure — we're shaping the future of AI and high-performance computing. Innovation thrives when brilliant minds have the freedom to push boundaries, which is why we foster a dynamic, fast-paced environment where creativity and expertise drive progress.
careers.valuesKicker: We're not just offering jobs — we're offering the chance to shape the future of AI.

engineering.title: Engineering Excellence
engineering.description: Build complex, cutting-edge technology that push the limits of what's possible. If you're an engineer who thrives on innovation, this is where you can truly test your skills and grow.

business.title: Business at the Forefront
business.description: Join a team of bold thinkers charting a global business from the ground up. We're looking for exceptional problem solvers ready to make a real impact in a rapidly evolving industry.

startup.title: Startup Energy, Big Ambitions
startup.description: We move fast, value fresh ideas, and believe in bold leaps. At NexusAI Cloud, proactivity, speed, and innovation aren't just encouraged — they're essential.

careers.officesKicker: Our team is at the forefront of global AI development.
careers.joinTeamTitle: Join a Global Team of Innovators
careers.joinTeamSubtitle: We want to bring together bold thinkers from around the world to drive the future of AI and high-performance computing. Our diverse, multicultural team thrives on collaboration, fresh perspectives, and a shared passion for pushing boundaries.

partners.heroSubtitle: Join a robust ecosystem of technology leaders to drive growth and innovation in AI infrastructure.
partners.whyJoinTitle: Why Join the NexusAI Partner Program?

access.title: Exclusive Access
access.description: Get priority access to new GPU infrastructure, beta features, and dedicated support channels.

marketing.title: Co-Marketing
marketing.description: Amplify your brand through joint marketing campaigns, case studies, and partner spotlights.

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: Receive dedicated technical resources, training materials, and priority engineering support.

blog.heroSubtitle: Discover the latest news, updates, and insights from our team.
